options.name: add
options.description: Add a new reminder for the future

options.name: time
options.description: When you want to be reminded from now (3m = 3 minutes, 4h = 4 hours, 5d = 5 days)

options.name: text
options.description: The text you want to be reminded about

options.name: manage
options.description: Show your active reminders and optionally delete some of them
